short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: *FOR GW STUDENTS ONLY* Access the entire University's student and faculty directory as you compose emails in your GWmail!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows GW affiliated students and faculty to instantly search and find anyone in the university community's email address and name with ease from their GWmail account.
